projects.name: COMING SOON
projects.longDescription: I'll be writing about my experiences and knowledge in the interactive apps and media space

projects.name: AR UX
projects.shortDescription: THIS IS A PLACEHOLDER UNTIL THE ARTICLE IS ACTUALLY WRITTEN
projects.longDescription: An exploration of the various ways of interacting with the virtual world using AR, including examples and code samples to achieve similar results in your own projects

projects.name: Hands Free in VR
projects.shortDescription: THIS IS A PLACEHOLDER UNTIL THE ARTICLE IS ACTUALLY WRITTEN
projects.longDescription: Some VR experiences don't allow for the use of your hands or traditional controllers. I cover a list of things to consider when building such an experience and some code samples to help you create a similar experience in your own projects.
